GULF OF GUINEA.
CAMEROON.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 04-09N 008-22E AT 141050Z AUG.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   FAX: 332 5631 2584,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG,
   COORD.NAVAREA2@SHOM.FR.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 211842Z AUG 19.
